Language.String14: This is the story of a duck;
Language.String15: But not just any normal duck...
Language.String16: A rubber duck...or rather, a duck MADE of rubber...
Language.String17: Okay, he WAS a regular duck before, but NOW he's rubber.
Language.String18: Did I mention scientists were involved? Yeah, that happened.
Language.String19: Science just came in and ruined this duck's day.
Language.String20: Now, he's decided not to duck around any longer...
